// data summary
table.select(table("user")).distinct.count()
table.select(table("product")).distinct.count()
table.describe().show()

val Array(training, test) = table.randomSplit(Array(0.8, 0.2))

// training and test set count
table.count()
val numTraining = training.count()
val numTest = test.count()
println("Training: " + numTraining + " test: " + numTest)

paragraphs.text:
// ALS model parameter customized
import scala.Tuple2
val als = new ALS().
setMaxIter(5).
setRank(20).
setAlpha(40).
setRegParam(0.01).
setImplicitPrefs(true).
setNonnegative(true).
setUserCol("user").
setItemCol("product").
setRatingCol("rating").
setPredictionCol("prediction")

val model = als.fit(training)
println(model.userFactors.count())
println(model.itemFactors.count())

// userFactor matrix print
model.userFactors.show(truncate = false)

// remove NaN from prediction
    model.setColdStartStrategy("drop")
    
// apply model on test data
    val predictions = model.transform(test)
    println(predictions.printSchema())
// calculate rmse
    val evaluator = new RegressionEvaluator().
      setMetricName("rmse").
      setLabelCol("rating").
      setPredictionCol("prediction")
    val rmse = evaluator.evaluate(predictions)

    println(s"Root-mean-square error = $rmse")

paragraphs.text:
model.setColdStartStrategy("drop")
val predictions = model.transform(test)
predictions.printSchema()
predictions.show()

val users = table.select(als.getUserCol).distinct.limit(3)
val userSubsetRecs = model.recommendForUserSubset(users, 10)
userSubsetRecs.show(truncate = false)

userRecs.write.
    option("header", "true").
    save("s3://find-smart-input/userRecs.csv")
